title: CalendarJS Integration Demo
description: Learn how to integrate calendar libraries with WSXJS components for creating interactive calendars. This demo showcases the seamless integration of @calenderjs/calendar with WSX components, demonstrating reactive state management and event handling.

demo.title: Interactive Calendar Demo
demo.description: Click on any date to select it. Navigate between months using the navigation controls.

basic.title: Basic Integration
basic.description: Import the calendar library and use it within your WSX component. The wsx-calendar component handles all calendar rendering logic.

events.title: Event Management
events.description: Manage calendar events with reactive state. Use @state decorator to track selected dates and events, ensuring automatic UI updates.

reactive.title: Reactive Updates
reactive.description: Use @state decorator for automatic calendar updates when dates change. The component automatically re-renders when state changes.

benefit1.title: Reactive State Management
benefit1.description: Use @state decorator for automatic calendar updates and re-rendering. No manual DOM manipulation needed.

benefit2.title: Seamless Integration
benefit2.description: Easily integrate third-party calendar libraries with WSX components. The framework handles DOM reconciliation automatically.

benefit3.title: Type Safety & Developer Experience
benefit3.description: Full TypeScript support ensures type-safe calendar operations. Enjoy IntelliSense and compile-time error checking.
